casebody.data:
IN RE the GUARDIANSHIP OF William Henry BROUGHTON (Alleged Incapacitated Adult), Dennis Broughton, Kevin Broughton, and Otis Broughton, 1 Appellants-Cross-Petitioners,
v.
Warren Broughton, Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-GU-44 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED August 28, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

MATHIAS , J.

Affirmed and remanded for proceedings consistent with this opinion.

BAILEY, J., Concurs.

BRADFORD, J., Concurs.

1

--------
